title: Idea for Riot by the community perhaps?

replies.body: Stupid idea... Oceanic region doesn't necessarily represent the ocean, the Southern Cross pretty much nailed it. It does represent the ocean in some aspects, but what about the people that live in the centre of Australia? They can't experience the ocean and nowhere near as often, so that idea wouldn't resonate well with them, the Southern Cross was a safe option that seemed to work, just a shame it's on a champ that isn't currently in the meta; Kassadin.

Oceania does have some tries to the ocean, but what's going to set "Octopus Vel'Koz" apart from every other ocean/water themed skin out there? e.g Pool Party skins, Coral Reef Malphite, Deep Terror Thresh... etc.

It's not very unique is it? But how many skins have a star constellation? One.
